required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Comparison FloShield Air System Versus Clearify Visualization System (D-HELP)
clinical_study.official_title: Prospective, Randomized Comparison of the Use of FloShield Air System Versus Clearify Visualization System (D-HELP) During Laparoscopic Surgery to Evaluate the Operative Interruption for Lens Cleaning

brief_summary.textblock: This is a post market, prospective, comparison study of the use of the FloShield Air System versus Clearify™ Visualization System (D-HELP) during laparoscopic surgery.

detailed_description.textblock: This is a post market, prospective, comparison study of the use of the FloShield Air System versus Clearify™ Visualization System (D-HELP) during laparoscopic surgery. The study will be randomized across two groups, one group will evaluate laparoscopic lens cleaning with D-HELP during laparoscopic surgery and the second group will evaluate laparoscopic lens cleaning using the FloShield Air System during laparoscopic surgery. Each surgery will be captured on video. Study parameters will be evaluated through review of each video by an independent evaluator.

primary_outcome.measure: number of Laparoscope removals during surgery
primary_outcome.description: The performance evaluations of the FloShield Air System will be based the difference between the cohorts on the number of scope removals per surgery.

arm_group.description: FloShield Air Laparoscopic Cleaning and Defogging System used during laparoscopic surgery
Clearify Visualization System used during laparoscopic surgery

intervention.description: gastrointestinal, gynecologic, urologic or bariatric laparoscopic surgery;
Sterile, single-use in vivo device to clean and defog the laparoscope camera lens
Single-use, ex vivo device to clean and defog the laparoscope camera lens
